Room.Name: Regalia Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Regalia Drive, east of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection with Rosecrest Street lies to the west, and the City Walls are just beyond Rosecrest. To the south is the Oceancrest Public Amphitheatre and to the north is the Oceancrest Ministry of Truth. Both places are usually pretty busy with activity, but usually for the opposite reasons. The Ministry houses numerous tome of various works which people enjoy studying, while the Amphitheatre is a venue to get away from the hassles of everyday life.
